message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
My turn. This is a better deal for you than what you'll get in later rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want the bigger share
This offer is still good for you.  The clock is ticking, and the deal is getting worse.
I'll meet you in the middle of our previous offers, don't let inflation win
Time to get serious. This is a good deal, especially considering inflation. Don't let your greed make us both losers.
